The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 28 April is 273,520 (31,524.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 23 April, there were 1,824 new confirmed cases (210.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 April, there were 2,781 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 34% (957 fewer cases).
